title: Are there any rappers who are upper class if we define 'class' as cultured, sophisticated behavior? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lil Dicky is definitely one that’s his appeal really. That he’s an average white gut that raps about being an average white guy in an industry not populated by average white guys like most industry’s are. Drake is another he was successful and well of before he started rapping and doesn’t really act hood. Finally I would say Macklemore he’s pop cause he doesn’t appeal to the normal fans of raps so he’s got a fan base of people who like “rap” but don’t like the rawness Of it.
